Traits.Name: Prowl
Traits.Description: Gains stealth at the start of their turn.

Traits.Name: Dodge
Traits.Description: Immune to all damage and effects on miss or successful save. Resistant to damage from non-attack spaces of area effects.

Traits.Name: Finishing Blow
Traits.Description: Deal bonus damage if character is bloody.

Actions.Name: Vile
Actions.Description: A foe in range 5 must save or become blind and blighted.

Actions.Name: Danse Macabre
Actions.Description: Target a close blast 2 area. Teleport three times. May deal light damage as an area effect to an adjacent foe each time. Must choose a different hostile character each time unless every character has been hit at least once.
